Web Hosting with Free Domain Name – TMDHosting Review

Technology
By Parveen Bhadoo On Apr 5, 2017
Share
0

What is TMD Hosting?

TMD Hosting is a new player on the field of web hosting, but they have built an outstanding infrastructure. All their data centers are certified under the SSAE-16 standard that guarantees their high levels of operation. Raised floors, climate control, 24/7 biometric security, fire suppression systems, water detection systems, UPS & generators are some of the things that make the home of your website as secure as possible.

Rating: 4.5 (Very Good)

TMDHosting is not the largest or best-known web hosting company in the world, but a visit to their website makes an immediate good impression. The company offers shared, VPS, cloud and reseller hosting, dedicated servers along with a ton of great features and premium support for all customers.

So I have decided to give it a spin.

While you will not find a huge quantity of reviews for TMDHosting, the testimonials you do find tend to be a lot more positive on the whole than those for many bigger name web hosts.

Quick Facts about TMDHosting

  • Get started for just $2.89 per month.
  • You get a free domain name forever.
  • The company offers free spam protection by SpamExperts.
  • The servers all run on SSD technology.
  • You get free daily backups and free restoration.
  • New websites are always installed for free by a specialist.
  • Support is available 24/7/365.

In addition they have datacenters at multiple locations across the globe for better speeds:

Plans and Pricing

As mentioned, there are many types of hosting. If you are looking for something cheap and basic, shared hosting is the way to go. Your next step up is VPS hosting, where you share a physical server with other customers, but you get your own virtual private machine, so it’s like renting the hardware yourself.

If you do want to operate your own server, you can opt for dedicated hosting. Alternately, cloud hosting is available if you want to be able to quickly and economically scale up and down to suit changing needs. Finally, if you are a web developer selling space to other customers, you can opt for reseller hosting.

Let’s take a closer look at each of the plans.

Promo Code for lifetime 5% extra discounts

BHADOO

The Best Among Web Hosts: Support Response Time

I don’t know about you, but I have dealt with a lot of web hosts that had response times ranging from 30 minutes to a day. Now if your site is not reachable that long, you are not a happy person.

TMD Hosting is outstanding in this regard: they usually respond to your ticket within minutes!

Shared Hosting

  • Amazing Package: Starting at $2.85 per month, and the renewal price stays the same after the promotional period ends.
  • Unlimited Package: Starting at $5.85 per month, and the renewal price stays the same after the promotional period.

The Amazing Package includes unlimited storage and bandwidth for a single domain along with WHM/cPanel. Both the startup price and the long-term price are very cheap!

The Unlimited Package is basically the same, but for unlimited domains. There isn’t a huge list of features, but the homepage does mention that TMDHosting supports free installation for templates, plugins, and apps, and recommends that you go open source.

So there are not a whole lot of bells and whistles, but on the whole this is a great deal for the money. Especially if you take advantage of the 50% discount.

VPS Hosting

There are five different VPS packages available, so you have a lot of tiers to choose from. At the bottom rung is VPS 1 (no fancy name there), which offers you 40 GB of space, 2000 GB of traffic, 1.8 GHz of dedicated CPU power with two cores, 1 GB of RAM, and 128 MB of burst RAM. That’s all for $35.95 per month.

The top level is VPS 5. At this tier, you get 150 GB of space, 7,000 GB of traffic, 3.0 GHz of dedicated CPU power with 8 cores, 4 GB of dedicated RAM, and 1024 MB of burst memory RAM. This is all for a monthly rate of $116. In between, the middle three tiers offer you a range of options ideal for any budget.

Many other companies offer only three tiers of VPS hosting, so you get a lot more flexibility here when it comes to your choices.

Dedicated Hosting

As with other hosting companies, TMD’s most expensive packages are the dedicated hosting tiers. There are four available, ranging from $229 per month at the lowest tier to $389 per month at the highest tier.

The $229 package includes 500 GB of storage space, 8 GB of RAM, and 10 TB of bandwidth. The $389 package gives you 2 x 1 TB of storage, 24 GB of RAM, and 10 TB of bandwidth. These are serious packages for serious commercial sites. All servers include root access, WHM access, and rapid provisioning.

Servers are fully managed, so if you are not technical, you have nothing to worry about. If you are, you have the control you need to manage your servers as you see fit.

Unlike companies that rely entirely on technology to manage servers, TMDHosting actually employs a full-time administrative team dedicated to monitoring servers for downtime, errors, and other hiccups. This extra layer of oversight prevents problems before they happen, and allows issues which do come up to be quickly and efficiently addressed.

Cloud Hosting

If flexibility is what you are in the market for, then cloud hosting from TMD is the scalable solution you are after. There are three tiers of service, cleverly named Summer Cloud, Rain Cloud, and Storm Cloud.

Packages start at $49.95 per month and include the ability to host unlimited domains, a free domain name, free SSH access, cPanel with WHM, and 24/7 support. These servers are also fully managed and monitored by a live human team.

Reseller Hosting

Do you run a company that builds websites and maintains them for other businesses? If so, you will want to have a look at the Reseller hosting packages offered by TMDHosting, which start at $19.95 per month. For that price, you get 56 GB of storage, 700 GB of bandwidth, unlimited domains, WHM/cPanel, and 24/7 support.

Additional packages are available for $34.95 and $49.95 per month. At the top level, you get 200 GB of storage and 2,000 GB of bandwidth.

Blogging Features

At first glance, you may think that TMDHosting does not offer optimized WordPress hosting, but as it turns out, they do. If you scroll down to the bottom of the page, you’ll find the link. You can get WordPress-optimized hosting starting at just $2.85 per month. You get a 60-day money-back guarantee with this type of account.

Setup takes only seconds.

What features do WordPress accounts with TMDHosting include? You get a free domain name you get to keep forever, free Spam protection by SpamExperts, and free daily backups and restoration. These are all services that other companies may charge for.

Other features include SSH Access, FFMPEG, and HD Codecs. Your website runs on SSD supercharged technology. The installation process is free, and takes only about 10 minutes to complete. It takes a single click to install WordPress-compatible modules. Template installation is also a breeze, and you get free updates.

In case you’re wondering, yes, TMDHosting provides you with an assortment of free WordPress templates and tutorials. Additional features include ID protection, an SSL certificate, and goMobi mobile readiness.

There are companies which offer more in-depth features and support for WordPress hosting, but all of this is really quite good for a hosting company that does not specialize in WordPress.

eCommerce Features

If you want to run a shop on your website, you are in the right place. TMDHosting offers an e-commerce optimized environment which is compatible with a number of different shopping cart programs, including Magento, PrestaShop, OpenCart, and WooCommerce.

You can enjoy features like unlimited space and bandwidth and a free domain name, as well as free setup and a 60-day money-back guarantee. On top of that, you get the same great benefits as other accounts on TMDHosting servers. Free backups and restoration and spam protection are yours.

You also get to work with a support team which has actually received specialized training in the shopping cart that you use.

Security Features

TMDHosting is a company which definitely takes security seriously. To start with, the servers utilize a CloudLinux distribution which provides for a number of security enhancements.

TMDHosting servers also receive security patches and operating system updates from the Cloud Linux Network (CLN). These ensure that your server is always protected from DDoS attacks and other vulnerabilities.

That isn’t all, either. TMDHosting has its own in-house firewall built on Apache’s mod_security. The firewall is updated every day by the support team. Additionally, you get free spam protection and SSL certificates.

Finally, to top it all off, the human monitoring team is there not just to look for hardware failures or errors, but to check for security threats as well. If the firewall misses something, the human team will be there to catch it.

Refund Policy

TMDHosting offers a 60-day money-back refund guarantee. This is one of the longest guarantees that I have seen while researching different web hosts. If you are unsatisfied for any reason within the first 60 days, you can end your service quickly and easily through the Client Area or by contacting customer service directly. You need to make sure that you submit a new ticket to the billing department when you request a refund.

Most other web hosting companies only give you around 30 days to evaluate their service before you make a commitment. This is not a whole lot of time to get a feel for the service. Sixty days gives you a chance to not only get set up with your website, but also learn your way around all the controls and features.

About the WebHostingTalk Discussion

I have seen a forum discussion coming up about accounts being suspended. The thing is, as you probably know, there is no real unlimited hosting. Most hosts work with averages. If your usage is many times more of the average, you can run into that problem with any web host.

In such cases web hosts should honor their money back guarantee for the remaining period. I am running smooth with my WP installation there. But if you face this issue, please let me know.

Ease-of-Use

TMDHosting’s cPanel is easy to use, and each hosting package they offer is optimized for a particular task.

If you are a blogger, a WordPress hosting package offers you an intuitive interface and one-click installation for your site and for add-ons. If you are running an online store, you will find the setup process effortless; you will be up and running in no time.

Customer Service

TMDHosting offers customer service 24 hours a day, seven days a week, every day of the year. You can reach the team via telephone, e-mail, or live chat. One way the customer service team goes above and beyond is through the 15-minute response time guarantee.

Any time you submit a support ticket, TMDHosting guarantees you will need to wait no more than 15 minutes to receive a response to your query. This will come as a relief to anyone who has ever worked with web host that made them sit on the phone for hours on end just to reach an agent.

Who Is TMDHosting Best For?

Because TMDHosting offers a wide variety of packages at different price points, their services are ideal for pretty much anyone. Whether you want to run a blog or a web store, operate a small business website or personal site, or you need dedicated hosting for a global commercial venture, you’re in the right place.

Pros of TMDHosting:

  • TMDHosting offers affordable packages and many tiers to choose from, as well as specialized hosting packages for blogging and e-commerce.
  • Security features on TMDHosting are top-shelf. You are not going to find a whole lot of web hosts that actually have a dedicated human team watching out for security threats and hardware malfunctions.
  • There are a ton of excellent free features that are included with all accounts. While other companies charge you for backups and restoration, spam protection, and a domain name, TMDHosting provides these services to you for free.
  • The customer support team really goes above and beyond with 24/7 help and a guaranteed 15-minute response time to all queries.
  • The 60-day money-back period is around twice as long as the industry standard.
  • Customer reviews for this web host are excellent.

Cons of TMDHosting:

  • This company does not have as many reviews as some other web hosts out there. As such, I know less about them than I’d like.
  • There are a lot more bells and whistles offered by other web hosts, especially for specialized services like WordPress hosting.

Conclusion

As you can see, there are not a lot of negatives that I can come up with for TMDHosting, but there are a whole lot of positives. This company may lack the history and reputation established by hundreds of reviews for competitors like HostGator or Bluehost, but those reviews that TMDHosting does have are outstanding.

So are their features and benefits, so I feel confident giving them a strong recommendation. TMDHosting appears to be a hidden gem in the hosting world. And right now you can join at a 50% discount!
